# PSYC 301

## Exam 1

$$\overline{x}=\frac{1}{N}\sum_{i=1}^N x_i$$

<br/>

$$s=\sqrt{\frac{\sum(x_i-\overline{x})^2}{N-1}}$$
<br/>

$$s^2=\frac{\sum(x_i-\overline{x})^2}{N-1}$$

<br/>

$$z_i=\frac{(x_i-\overline{x})}{s}$$
